answers.answer: Hi there!Well, without a clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms. This could be a hairline/ frank fracture, dislocation, injuries, inflammation etc. I would suggest getting this evaluated by an orthopedician for an accurate diagnosis and appropriate management.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: HI,I think I have found the part on my wrist where it is most uncomfortable.On left hand  of your thumb follow straight down to the bony sticking out bit on wrist just feels on and off as if it is bruised and where the pain on both sides seem to get irritated most. Elbow seems a little stiff and left hand of my palm along thumb is more puffy then the right only slightly what is this?Also I have noticed the last 2 weeks my stomach has been having strange pulling,stinging/fizzing, sharp pains that I thought was just normal I guess tummy acid but again quite uncomfortable. No diabetes just under active thyroid.
title: stiff elbow?
